hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.tagline: Transforming ideas into code. Creating amazing digital experiences with modern technologies and elegant design.

about.title: About Me
about.name: Wesley de Carvalho Augusto Correia
bio: From the internet cafes of my childhood where I started working, to today, my journey is marked by a passion for technology and supporting businesses with IT solutions, technical support, and automation. I've worked as a freelancer, in the family IT company, and in industries such as gas and energy (Petrobras), tobacco (Philip Morris), legal, and critical financial infrastructure (Central Bank/Anbima/SELIC). This diversity has forged my technical versatility and strategic vision. Analytical and solution-oriented, I identify bottlenecks and create automations that generate measurable efficiency. I adapt easily to large corporations or dynamic contexts, standing out in creative solutions under pressure. More than executing, I understand contexts, propose improvements, and deliver value. I learn quickly, value collaboration, enjoy being useful and helping people, and seek challenges that combine innovation and business impact.

experience.title: Experience
experience.value: Experience in IT with support, development, and Governance. In addition to administrative experiences and legal and salesforce backoffice.

education.title: Education
education.value: Graduated in Law. Pursuing a Postgraduate degree in FullStack Java Development, MBA in Project Management (paused) and studying Computer Science (in progress)

projects.title: Projects
projects.value: Automation and System Modernization and fullstack application development.

highlights.title: Critical financial infrastructure modernization
highlights.text: Selic mainframe migration (COBOL) to a Java architecture (Novo-Selic).

highlights.title: Observability and monitoring
highlights.text: Full stack implementation (Prometheus, Grafana, Actuator, Micrometer, Blackbox Exporter, Alertmanager) for performance metrics and health checks.

highlights.title: Full stack development
highlights.text: Java (Spring) Backend + Angular Frontend.

highlights.title: DevOps and containerization
highlights.text: Docker, CI/CD, branch versioning with GitLab for collaboration and automated deployment practices.

highlights.title: Data management
highlights.text: Oracle (containerized) Database (SQL), schema versioning with Liquibase / SQL scripts.

highlights.title: Project Management
highlights.text: development cycle of artifacts, executive reports, and control of strategic initiatives aligned with the PDTIC.

highlights.title: Business Intelligence
highlights.text: Power BI (DAX) interactive dashboards to visualize KPIs and support executive decision-making.

highlights.title: Web development
highlights.text: custom SharePoint webparts (JavaScript, HTML, CSS) integrated via SharePoint API for corporate governance.

highlights.title: C-level solutions
highlights.text: document and news displays for the Central Bank and ANBIMA leadership.

highlights.title: Management frameworks
highlights.text: practical application of PMI, Agile, MPS.BR, and CMMI for standardization and continuous improvement of processes.

highlights.title: Knowledge management
highlights.text: creation of strategic content and low-code/no-code solutions (Notion) for business continuity.

highlights.title: Procedural and financial diligence
highlights.text: protocols, court inquiries, payments of fees and judicial deposits, control of payments between client and firm, and procedural obligations.

highlights.title: Process automation
highlights.text: Python, VBA, and Selenium for web scraping from various Brazilian courts + RPA: automated integration between internal system and judicial platforms.

highlights.title: Operational optimization
highlights.text: reduced time of procedural data entry via scripts, improving data flow and productivity.

highlights.title: Legal data analysis
highlights.text: summaries of petitions and management of procedural information in internal systems.

highlights.title: VBA/Excel automation
highlights.text: automation for data collection, report generation, and managerial email delivery.

highlights.title: Inventory control
highlights.text: managed stock and distribution of promotional materials (trade marketing) and office supplies.

highlights.title: Sales analysis
highlights.text: analyzed sales volumes, commercial KPIs, and optimized administrative routines via macros.

highlights.title: Operational management
highlights.text: worked with Excel in operational management. Data entry and reading in SAP.

highlights.title: Customer and support
highlights.text: customer service, bottle returns center, and LPG supplier support. Assisted queue management and supported vendors.

highlights.title: Quality control
highlights.text: quality control and inspection in cylinder production.
